text: @PeteButtigieg Why do so many supporters of @realDonaldTrump justify their COVID-19 opinions by stating "fake news" - criticizing the source of information - WHILE AT THE SAME TIME exclaiming belief in God and never questioning the source of that information? One is tangible, the other is not.
